Title: Relates to single occupancy bathrooms
Summary: Relates to making all single occupancy bathrooms gender neutral in school districts, charter schools, SUNY, CUNY, community colleges, restaurants, bars, mercantile establishments, factories and state-owned or operated buildings.
LawCode: Add §79-o, Civ Rts L; add §409-m, amd §§355, 6206 & 6306, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law and the education law, in relation to single occupancy bathroom facilities
